text:
In today's lesson you're going to learn 
English with the Netflix movie Don't Look Up!

This movie has recently broken the Netflix 
record for weekly viewership with more than 152
million viewing hours in a single week.

Don't Look Up is a satirical science 
fiction film about two astronomers

played by Leonardo DiCaprio and Jennifer Lawrence 
who discover a large comet that's coming down to

Earth and will destroy the entire planet.
Despite presenting a lot of evidence nobody

believes the two astronomers, even the Ppresident 
of the United States played by Meryl Streep.

We've selected two scenes for you to watch 
today, but before we start, every week we

release lessons to help intermediate and advanced 
learners like you to improve their English

in a fun and dynamic way. Without getting lost, 
without missing the jokes and without subtitles.

Just like Israt, who says that he's realized how 
much his English has improved in just two months

because he can now watch TV series 
without subtitles, so if you're new

here make sure you join our community of 
over 5 million learners by subscribing now.

With our app you can have short 
English conversations with people from

all over the world, at the touch of a button.
You can also improve your listening skills

with our Podcast, which comes with transcripts 
and vocabulary notes for you to follow along.

You can download it for FREE in 
the Google Play or Apple App Store

and you'll also find a link up here 
and one down in the description below.

Join the global conversation 
by downloading the app now!
I hope you enjoyed today's lesson!

To keep learning check out this video 
on prepositions that we made recently.
